description: Automate the backup of your Cloudflare projects to a GitHub repository. Ensure your projects are securely stored and easily retrievable with this seamless integration. Start safeguarding your Cloudflare data today with minimal setup required.

githubRepoName.description: The name of your GitHub repository to store backups

githubAccessToken.description: Your GitHub personal access token with repo scope

cloudflareApiToken.description: Your Cloudflare API token with read access

projectIds.description: Optional array of Cloudflare project IDs to backup. If not provided, all projects will be backed up.

tools.name: restore_project
tools.description: Restore a Cloudflare project from a backup

projectId.description: ID of the Cloudflare project to restore

timestamp.description: Optional timestamp of the backup to restore. If not provided, the most recent backup will be used.

tools.name: list_backups
tools.description: List available backups for a Cloudflare project
